title: Can I erase data in dead Pixel via PC (mounting as Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008)?
content:
My Pixel phone died and won't reboot. I have already exhausted the various options and am no longer trying to repair the phone. But I want to erase all my data before recycling the phone. The only way I can "communicate" with the phone is by connecting it to my PC, where it shows up as a device named "Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008".

My question is: is there a way to erase the phone from the PC through this device?

Thanks in advance!
